title: Brand New Accommodations Await Travelers At Fairfield Inn & Suites Calgary Downtown
text:
Fairfield Inn & Suites Calgary Downtown
Hotel in Downtown Calgary breathes new life into the city and invites visitors into a new kind of travel experience
CALGARY, Alberta , Aug. 18, Fairfield Inn & Suites Calgary Downtown welcomes guests from all over the world to one of Calgary's newest hotels.
Just opened this summer, the hotel features 124 luxurious guest rooms and suites, inviting business, leisure and event travelers to take advantage of their affordable rates and convenient location in the heart of the city.
"As the first Fairfield Inn & Suites in Calgary , we are excited to continue welcoming new guests to our modern suites overlooking beautiful downtown," said General Manager Brad Schlosser . "We believe our quality accommodations and friendly service truly set us apart amongst other hotels in the city."
Located just minutes off of MacLeod Trail, which passes through the most popular parts of Calgary , the hotel offers easy access to Calgary Zoo, Calgary Telus Convention Center and countless other area attractions . Adjacent to Central Memorial Park, Calgary's oldest park, visitors will also enjoy quick travel to and from Calgary International Airport, Calgary Tower, Glenbow Museum and Stampede Park & Exhibition Grounds.
After a long day of exploring the city, guests can indulge in a delicious dining experience at one of the hotel's two restaurants , The Beltliner Diner, open for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or Native Tongues Tacquiero, open for lunch and dinner.
Following a satisfactory meal, visitors will return to thoughtfully designed suites featuring plenty of space to spread out. Stay productive in privacy with complimentary Wi-Fi, large work desks and ergonomic chairs, or retreat to relaxation with 48-inch flat-panel TVs and cozy couches. When it's time to get some shut-eye, thick mattresses topped with luxurious bedding and piles of fluffy pillows will ensure a night of sweet dreams.
About Fairfield Inn & Suites Calgary Downtown
Fairfield Inn & Suites Calgary Downtown at 239 12 th Avenue in Calgary, Alberta , owned by Parke Seville Mortgage GP Ltd. and managed by Luxury Hotels International of Canada , ULC., features 11 floors with 79 rooms, 45 suites, 2 on-site restaurants, a convenience market, state-of-the-art fitness center and business center. Breakfast and Wi-Fi are both complimentary. For more information or to book reservations, visit www.marriott.com/YYCFI or call the hotel directly at 1-403-351-6500.
About Fairfield Inn & Suites
Fairfield Inn & Suites by Marriott is designed for today's traveler who is looking to be productive on the road. In addition to complimentary Wi-Fi and hot breakfast, Fairfield Inn & Suites offers thoughtfully designed rooms and suites that provide separate living, working and sleeping areas.
